Should not differentiate

  • Side-by-side paragraph diffs
  • Support definition lists, i.e. <DL>
  • Support table column insertions
  • Optimize for changelogs and other very long documents that append to the front or back
  • Show when a list item is promoted upwards or demoted downwards
  • Side-by-side paragraph diffs
    • Center a paragraph that has no changes or small changes
    • Side-by-side when a paragraph's changes exceed a certain threshold
    • Hilight the changes even though they're side-by-side
